get.description: Displays api tokens -> "token":"name"

post.description:
Creates a new api token for the given customer number, inits all the required databases and creates a qr code
representing to api token

get.summary: Fetches the api key as qr code
get.description: Shows the token in qr code representation

post.description:
Uploads the RSA public key of the mobile client to the server
and generates a unique tan in the current customer context

parameters.name: Public Key
parameters.description: the public key of the mobile client

post.summary: Uploads the encrypted data for a specific client

parameters.name: tan
parameters.description: the tan of the mobile client who should retrive the data

parameters.description: The Aes data of the desktop client

parameters.description: the tan of the mobile client from whom we want to fetch the tan/public_key

200.description: OK, returns the rsa data of the mobile client

mita.description: can be empty, null or filled

att.description: Array string bestehend aus dateinamen getrennt durch "|"

api_key.description: Needed for every api call, verifies the client (something like a licence key)

public_key.description: The public key of the mobile client

tan.description: A unique tan for each device

encrypted.description: Aes encrypted Person Mapping (formate to be discussed)

tan.description: A unique tan for each device

public_key.description: The public key of the mobile client

number.description: The number of records for tan and day

status.description:
0 -> noch nicht angerufen (default)
1 -> besttigt (kommt)
2 -> kommt nicht
3 -> abgehoben aber nicht besttigt
4 -> nicht erreicht
5 -> nicht abgehoben

status_reason.description: Reason why a specific status was set (eg "Employee ill")
